feedingHabits: High-protein, high-fat diet. Feed twice a day.
groomingNeeds: Moderate. Heavy shedding, especially seasonally. Regular brushing required.

feedingHabits: High-protein, high-fat diet. Controlled feeding to avoid obesity.
groomingNeeds: High. Thick coat, sheds heavily twice a year. Frequent brushing needed.

feedingHabits: High-protein diet with moderate fat. Regular meals required.
groomingNeeds: Low. Short coat. Minimal brushing, regular baths and ear cleaning needed.

feedingHabits: Balanced diet rich in protein, low in fat. Controlled portions.
groomingNeeds: Moderate. Weekly brushing and regular ear cleaning.

feedingHabits: High-protein, high-fat. Balanced, controlled portions to prevent obesity.
groomingNeeds: Low. Short coat. Minimal brushing, regular baths.

feedingHabits: High-quality, small-bite diet. Frequent small meals.
groomingNeeds: Low to moderate. Short-haired needs occasional brushing; long-haired needs more care.

feedingHabits: Balanced diet with moderate protein and fat. Portion control needed.
groomingNeeds: High. Long coat. Regular brushing, baths, and ear cleaning.

feedingHabits: High-protein, high-fat. Larger portions for energy maintenance.
groomingNeeds: Low. Short coat. Minimal brushing, regular baths.

feedingHabits: High-protein. Multiple smaller meals daily with portion control.
groomingNeeds: Low. Minimal brushing, regular cleaning due to size.

feedingHabits: Balanced diet, low purine. Moderate protein and fat.
groomingNeeds: Low. Weekly brushing to manage shedding.

feedingHabits: High-protein, high-fat. Quality food to support activity.
groomingNeeds: Low. Short coat. Occasional brushing and regular baths.

feedingHabits: High-protein, balanced diet. Feed twice daily.
groomingNeeds: Moderate. Weekly brushing. Heavy seasonal shedding.

feedingHabits: High-protein. Monitor weight to prevent obesity.
groomingNeeds: Moderate. Regular brushing to reduce shedding and matting.

feedingHabits: High-protein to support large size. Meets energy and maintenance needs.
groomingNeeds: High. Weekly brushing for heavy shedding and tangling.

feedingHabits: Balanced diet with moderate protein and fat. Small, frequent meals.
groomingNeeds: High. Daily brushing to prevent tangles and mats.

feeding_habits: High-quality, balanced diet tailored to small size; smaller, frequent meals.
grooming_needs: High - daily brushing, occasional bathing, regular ear and eye care.

feeding_habits: High-protein, high-energy diet; moderate fat content; avoid overfeeding.
grooming_needs: High - regular brushing, seasonal heavy shedding, occasional baths.

feeding_habits: High-protein, balanced diet with moderate fat.
grooming_needs: Low - occasional brushing.

feeding_habits: High-protein, calorie-dense diet to support large size.
grooming_needs: High - regular brushing, heavy seasonal shedding.

grooming_needs: Low - regular brushing.

feeding_habits: High-protein diet; small meals throughout the day.
grooming_needs: Moderate - regular brushing, hand-stripping or clipping.

feeding_habits: High-protein diet; balanced with moderate fat content.
grooming_needs: Low - occasional brushing.

feeding_habits: High-quality, protein-rich diet in small portions.

grooming_needs: Moderate - regular hand-stripping or clipping, weekly brushing.

feeding_habits: High-protein, nutrient-dense diet; monitor weight.
grooming_needs: Moderate - regular brushing, seasonal heavy shedding.

feeding_habits: High-protein, high-calorie diet; supports muscle mass and energy.
grooming_needs: High - regular brushing, heavy seasonal shedding.

feeding_habits: High-protein, balanced diet with moderate fat; two meals a day.
grooming_needs: Low - regular brushing.

feeding_habits: Balanced, high-protein diet; avoid overfeeding.
grooming_needs: High - daily brushing, regular ear cleaning and trimming.

feedingHabits: High-protein diet, regular meals with high-quality food.
groomingNeeds: Low grooming needs, moderate shedding, regular brushing and ear cleaning.

feedingHabits: High-protein, balanced diet, high-quality kibble, twice daily.
groomingNeeds: Moderate grooming, heavy shedding, regular brushing.

feedingHabits: Balanced high-protein diet, small meals with portion control.
groomingNeeds: Low grooming needs, minimal shedding, occasional brushing.

feedingHabits: High-protein, balanced diet, portion-controlled twice daily.
groomingNeeds: Low grooming needs, minimal shedding, regular brushing.

feedingHabits: Balanced high-protein diet, strict portion control.
groomingNeeds: Low grooming needs, minimal shedding, clean skin folds and ears.

feedingHabits: Balanced high-protein diet, portion-controlled twice daily.
groomingNeeds: Moderate grooming, regular brushing, occasional hand-stripping.

feedingHabits: Balanced high-protein diet, high-quality kibble, avoid overfeeding.
groomingNeeds: Moderate grooming, regular brushing, ear cleaning and trimming.

feedingHabits: High-protein, nutrient-dense diet, small portions.
groomingNeeds: Low grooming needs (short-haired); more for long-haired.

feedingHabits: Balanced high-protein diet, regular meals with portion control.
groomingNeeds: High grooming needs; skin care for hairless, brushing for powderpuff.

feedingHabits: High-quality, protein-rich diet; may need limited-ingredient food.
groomingNeeds: Moderate grooming, regular cleaning of skin folds.

feedingHabits: Balanced diet with moderate protein and fat; portion control needed.
groomingNeeds: High grooming needs, thick coat needs frequent brushing.

feedingHabits: High-quality diet, calorie control to prevent obesity.
groomingNeeds: High grooming needs, regular brushing and ear cleaning.

feedingHabits: Balanced diet with controlled fat, supports immune and skin health.
groomingNeeds: High grooming needs, regular brushing, ears cleaned often.

feedingHabits: High-quality, protein and omega-rich diet with portion control.
groomingNeeds: High grooming needs, regular brushing, professional trimming, clean ears.

feeding_habits: Active dogs need high-protein food. May eat quickly, so slow feeders are useful.
grooming_needs: Low. Short coat requires only weekly brushing.
care_rating: 3/5 – Energetic, social, and independent. Needs space to roam or regular runs. Best in rural settings.

feeding_habits: Needs quality food with joint support and controlled portions to avoid obesity.
grooming_needs: Moderate to high. Feathered coat requires brushing several times a week.
care_rating: 4/5 – Sweet-natured and friendly. Requires both physical activity and social time. Adaptable and elegant.

feeding_habits: Moderate to high-calorie diet needed for active individuals. High-protein food supports working lines.
grooming_needs: Moderate. Brushing a few times per week helps control shedding.
care_rating: 4/5 – Hardworking, loyal, and intelligent. Excellent for farms or homes that can provide structure and purpose.

feeding_habits: Needs quality dog food rich in protein and omega-3s to support coat and energy levels.
grooming_needs: High. Regular brushing and occasional trimming, especially around ears and legs.
care_rating: 4/5 – Happy, alert, and eager to please. Thrives with attention, daily activity, and socialization.

feeding_habits: Small breed kibble with added dental support. Prone to weight gain if overfed.
grooming_needs: Moderate. Long, soft coat requires brushing a few times weekly and cleaning of ears and eyes.
care_rating: 3/5 – Calm and affectionate. Best for quiet households. Sensitive and may be reserved around strangers.

feeding_habits: Needs a protein-rich diet to support muscle development and energy needs.
grooming_needs: Low. Short, dense coat needs brushing weekly to manage shedding.
care_rating: 4/5 – Energetic, loyal, and protective. Needs active lifestyle and experienced handlers.

feeding_habits: Needs large-breed food with support for joints. Feed controlled portions to avoid obesity.
grooming_needs: Moderate. Thick coat needs brushing a few times weekly, more during shedding seasons.
care_rating: 3/5 – Independent and protective. Best in rural homes with space and strong leadership.

feeding_habits: Moderate diet with attention to weight management. Sensitive stomachs are possible.
grooming_needs: Moderate to high. Thick double coat needs brushing several times a week.
care_rating: 4/5 – Calm, reserved, and family-oriented. Needs socialization and steady routines.

feeding_habits: Active breed requiring high-quality food. Monitor for weight gain with treats.
grooming_needs: Moderate. Needs regular brushing and trimming of feathering.
care_rating: 4/5 – Gentle, intelligent, and adaptable. Great companion but needs consistent exercise and mental enrichment.

feeding_habits: Active breed—needs protein-rich food with joint support; split meals to avoid bloating.
grooming_needs: High. Thick double coat needs brushing several times a week, especially in shedding season.
care_rating: 4/5 – Friendly, intelligent, and energetic. Needs both mental stimulation and physical activity. Adapts well to cold climates.

feeding_habits: Light eaters. Requires high-quality kibble with healthy fats to maintain energy.
grooming_needs: Moderate. Dense coat needs weekly brushing; heavier during seasonal shedding.
care_rating: 3/5 – Alert, vocal, and independent. Needs patience in training but very loyal to families.

feeding_habits: Active dog requiring a balanced, high-protein diet. Prone to overfeeding.
grooming_needs: Moderate. Glossy coat requires brushing a few times a week.
care_rating: 4/5 – Playful, sociable, and good with kids. Retains puppy-like behavior into adulthood.

feeding_habits: Prone to obesity—needs portion-controlled meals with sensitive digestion formulas.
grooming_needs: Low. Short coat is easy to maintain, but facial wrinkles need frequent cleaning.
care_rating: 3/5 – Affectionate and easygoing. Doesn’t require much exercise but can have breathing issues.

feeding_habits: Needs high-protein, high-energy food, especially for working dogs.
grooming_needs: Moderate. Long coat needs brushing 2–3 times a week and trimming.
care_rating: 4/5 – Smart, hardworking, and versatile. Thrives with active owners who enjoy outdoor activities.

feeding_habits: Needs quality kibble rich in protein and healthy fats. Split meals to avoid energy crashes.
grooming_needs: Low. Short coat requires minimal brushing.
care_rating: 4/5 – Loyal, energetic, and alert. Needs structured training and an engaged owner.

feeding_habits: Large-breed diet rich in protein and joint supplements. Multiple small meals preferred.
grooming_needs: Moderate to high. Sheds heavily—needs frequent brushing.
care_rating: 5/5 – Highly intelligent, trainable, and versatile. Needs mental challenges and consistent exercise.

feeding_habits: High energy needs—requires nutrient-dense food with lean proteins.
grooming_needs: Low. Short coat only needs occasional brushing.
care_rating: 4/5 – Friendly, athletic, and eager to please. Needs a lot of activity to prevent boredom.

feeding_habits: Balanced diet with attention to dental health. Avoid overfeeding.
grooming_needs: Moderate. Thick double coat needs brushing several times a week.
care_rating: 3/5 – Lively, intelligent, and alert. Good for experienced owners who enjoy active pets.

feeding_habits: Needs a high-protein, high-energy diet with glucosamine for joint health.
grooming_needs: High. Needs regular clipping and brushing; beard and eyebrows require special care.
care_rating: 4/5 – Bold, protective, and highly trainable. Thrives in working or structured homes.
